compliant.legal provisions: Right to object to direct marketing

non_compliant.section: 此類資料將被用來設計符合瀏覽者之網頁內容或行銷宣傳，並做為我們為網頁瀏覽者提供一個更好的上網環境做參考。除外，精聯電子可能會將此類整合資料提供給廣告經銷商、業務夥伴、贊助者等；例如：告知他們線上男性或女性瀏覽者之比率、或在某一依年齡層範圍瀏覽者之比率。
non_compliant.amend: The policy needs to specify the legitimate interests for data processing and demonstrate a balance test against the rights and freedoms of data subjects. Vague terms like "better online experience" are not sufficient.

non_compliant.section: 精聯電子可能會將此類整合資料提供給廣告經銷商、業務夥伴、贊助者等；例如：告知他們線上男性或女性瀏覽者之比率、或在某一依年齡層範圍瀏覽者之比率。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly identify all third parties with whom data is shared, not just categories. It should also specify the purpose and legal basis for each instance of third-party sharing.

non_compliant.section: 我們的網站有時會有我們合作夥伴的相關連結、廣告、或其他相關組織訊息，如果您連結到這些網站，每個網站皆有他們的隱私權政策，但我們不接受這些網站的隱私權政策，如您要在這些第三方網站留下個人資料，請務必詳閱他們的隱私權政策。
non_compliant.amend: Simply stating that the company is not responsible for third-party websites is insufficient. The policy should provide clear and specific information about the use of cookies and other tracking technologies on the website, including the purpose and legal basis for their use.

non_compliant.section: 本隱私權聲明所敘述之任何文字內容，旨在規範發生任何個人資料被蒐集或利用等情事。精聯電子將保留得以隨時增刪修飾本隱私權聲明之權利，任何增刪修飾後之聲明，應以我們的網頁公告時間為即時生效日。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: While the policy mentions the right to modify, it lacks information on how users will be informed about changes and what constitutes valid consent for those changes. GDPR requires clear and affirmative consent.
